shloka_translation: You have a right to perform your prescribed duty, but you are not entitled to the fruits of action.
shloka_invite: Dive into the wisdom of ancient texts and build your own library of knowledge.
footer_description: Hindu Library is a digital sanctuary for lovers of Hindu literature and wisdom. Explore, upload, and cherish timeless texts—from Vedas to modern interpretations. Join us in preserving and sharing the rich heritage of Sanatana Dharma.
